data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Nikolay Voloshin awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Otkritie Arena.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 5, Spartak Moscow are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 6, Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Ezequiel Ponce for Spartak Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 8, Spartak Moscow drives forward and Ezequiel Ponce gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
Flamarion (Volgograd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 10, Spartak Moscow's Jordan Larsson gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Spartak Moscow.
Zurab Davitashvili is booked for the away team.
In the minute 14, An attacking Spartak Moscow player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Aleksandr Kokorin gives Spartak Moscow a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 16, Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
Zurab Davitashvili (Volgograd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 21, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 24, Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
In Moscow, Ezequiel Ponce of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Volgograd in Moscow.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In the minute 31, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 32, Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 36, Andres Ponce (Volgograd) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Moscow.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Volgograd drive upfield and Flamarion gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
In the minute 40, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Georgi Dzhikiya (Spartak Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aleksandr Kokorin of Spartak Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 44, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow just outside Volgograd's area.
Nikolay Voloshin awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 45, Volgograd pushes forward through Zurab Davitashvili, whose finish on goal is saved.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Spartak Moscow's Victor Moses is on target but unsuccessful.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow's Jordan Larsson breaks free at Otkritie Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Important block from the Volgograd defence as Ezequiel Ponce fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Moscow Spartak Moscow drive forward through Ezequiel Ponce. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 53, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Volgograd.
Volgograd's Andres Ponce goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 55, Zurab Davitashvili (Volgograd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 56, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
The match at Otkritie Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Georgi Dzhikiya, who is down injured.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Georgi Dzhikiya is back on his feet again.
Andres Ponce of Volgograd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) has received a yellow card from Nikolay Voloshin.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Volgograd are coming forward and Oleg Aleynik gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 63, Spartak Moscow make their first substitution with Andrey Eshchenko replacing Nail Umyarov.
In the minute 64, Nikolay Voloshin signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. Volgograd have an attacking throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Georgi Dzhikiya, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 68, Nikolay Voloshin signals a Volgograd throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Georgi Dzhikiya for Spartak Moscow is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 69, Zelimkhan Bakaev is on a sub for Aleksandr Kokorin for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 70, Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
In the minute 71, Alex Kral's header is off-target for Spartak Moscow.
Nikolay Voloshin awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Volgograd's Zurab Davitashvili is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 75, Aleksandr Khatskevich (Volgograd) is making a first substitution, with Beka Mikeltadze replacing Kamil Mullin.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Otkritie Arena.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 78, Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Zelimkhan Bakaev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
Spartak Moscow's Alex Kral gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
In Moscow, Zelimkhan Bakaev of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 79, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Nikolai Kipiani is replacing Zurab Davitashvili for the away team.
In the minute 81, Volgograd needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Spartak Moscow pushes forward through Ezequiel Ponce, whose finish on goal is saved.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 84, Free kick in a good position for Volgograd!
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced Evgeniy Pesegov with Sergey Serchenkov. This is the third substitution made today by Aleksandr Khatskevich.
In the minute 85, Aleksandr Khatskevich is making the team's fourth substitution at Otkritie Arena with Aleksandr Saplinov replacing Flamarion.
Andrey Eshchenko (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 88, Nikolay Voloshin awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 89, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
The home team replace Jordan Larsson with Ilya Kutepov.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Otkritie Arena.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Victor Moses gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Spartak Moscow extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a Samuel Gigot header.
Zelimkhan Bakaev instrumental with a fine assist.
